question: How much food should i be eating per meal?
question_content:
i heard ur supposed to eat the amount of food that wuld fit in your palm! thats ridiculous! lol 

im 16

answers.answer_content:
Depends on what you are eating...around 200 - 300 cals per meal, at least 6 meals per day (or every 3 hrs while you are awake)...

Consider an apple with a tablespoon of peanut butter would fit in your hand and fit that calorie range...a salad full of veggies with no dressing, would fill a large bowl to reach that calorie range...

The amount of meat you should eat, should fit in your palm or be about the size of a pack of playing cards...if you don't eat meat, then the quantity will vary depending on the protein source you are consuming...

That answer about the palm of your hand is talking about the amount of meat at a meal.  It is not the amount you should be eating in total. 

Be sure you are eating a variety of fruits and vegetables, and whole grains(bread, pasta , cereal).  Eat 3 meals plus 2 snacks a day, and drink plenty of water and limit your sugar and you should be fine.
well 3 meals a day. medium portions
